description: Deforestation Satellite Connector Service - AGENT-DATA-007 (GL-DATA-GEO-003). Monitors satellite scene acquisition, change detection, deforestation alerts, EUDR compliance reporting, pipeline performance, and land cover classification for the GreenLang Climate OS deforestation monitoring layer.

links.title: Deforestation Satellite Documentation
links.tooltip: View Deforestation Satellite Connector API documentation

panels.description: Total number of satellite scenes acquired from all providers (Sentinel-2, Landsat, Planet, etc.)
panels.title: Satellite Scenes Acquired

panels.description: Number of currently active monitoring jobs tracking deforestation across all regions
panels.title: Active Monitoring Jobs

panels.description: Total forest area currently under satellite monitoring in hectares
panels.title: Forest Area Monitored

panels.description: Total number of processing errors across all engines and pipeline stages
panels.title: Processing Errors

panels.description: Rate of change detections per second, broken down by change type (clear_cut, degradation, regrowth, fire, flooding, etc.)
panels.title: Change Detections by Type

panels.description: Distribution of change detection types across all monitored regions
panels.title: Change Detection Distribution

panels.description: Total clear-cut deforestation detections - the most severe type of forest loss
panels.title: Clear-Cut Detections

panels.description: Total forest degradation detections - gradual canopy loss below clear-cut threshold
panels.title: Degradation Detections

panels.description: Rate of deforestation alerts processed per second, broken down by source (satellite, ground_truth, tip_off, regulatory)
panels.title: Alerts by Source

panels.description: Distribution of deforestation alerts by severity level (critical, high, medium, low, info)
panels.title: Alerts by Severity

panels.description: Alerts flagged as post-cutoff date deforestation events, filtered for high confidence. Critical for EUDR compliance.
panels.title: Post-Cutoff Alerts

panels.description: Total number of critical severity deforestation alerts requiring immediate action
panels.title: Critical Alerts

panels.description: Distribution of compliance reports by status (compliant, non_compliant, pending, under_review)
panels.title: Compliance Reports by Status

panels.description: Baseline checks performed against deforestation cutoff dates, broken down by country
panels.title: Baseline Checks by Country

panels.description: Overall compliance rate as a percentage: compliant reports / total reports * 100. Target: > 95%.
panels.title: Compliance Rate

panels.description: Heatmap of pipeline stage durations across all processing stages (acquisition, preprocessing, classification, change_detection, alert_generation, compliance_check, export)
panels.title: Pipeline Duration by Stage

panels.description: Rate of pipeline runs per second, broken down by processing stage
panels.title: Pipeline Runs by Stage

panels.description: Satellite scene acquisition duration percentiles (p50, p95, p99). SLO target: p95 < 60s.
panels.title: Scene Acquisition Duration

panels.description: Rate of processing errors per second, broken down by engine (scene_acquisition, change_detection, classification, alert_generation, compliance_engine, baseline_checker, export_engine)
panels.title: Errors by Engine

panels.description: Distribution of land cover classifications by type (forest, non_forest, water, urban, agriculture, grassland, bare_soil, cloud, shadow)
panels.title: Classifications by Type

title: Deforestation Satellite Connector - GL-DATA-GEO-003
